feed.title: GoDoxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.13.4
entry.content:
Changes / Fixes

Improvements

  • Autocert: allow specifying custom acme directory url (experimental)
  • WebUI: App tooltip no longer show up when right-click menu if opened
  • General: Improved memory and object lifecycle management
  • OIDC: restore old behavior - when user is allowed, allowed_group won't be checked, and vice-versa

Security

  • Use ECDSA P-256 for autocert obtained certs instead of RSA 2048

Misc

  • Websocket: replaces coder/websocket package with gorilla/websocket

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.13.5
entry.content:
Changes / Fixes

  • Fix reload stuck / error
  • Fix attempt for unknown format: &{} notification error
  • Fix attempt for occasional invalid oauth state error for OIDC
  • Add option to disable compression

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.13.6
entry.content:
• Updated OIDC redirect logic, now works without Access-Control-Allow-Origin set to *
  • Fixed #121 Routes suddenly being removed on v0.13.5
  • Updated Proxies page on WebUI for showing more details and better column order

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.13.8
entry.content:
Changes / Fixes

WebUI:

  • Refined Navbar

  • Refined login page for user password login

  • Improve home page loading speed by caching items locally
  • Adjusted app hover tooltip positioning
  • Fixed app hover tooltip being shown when dragging
  • Fixed "Align health bubble" End option not working properly

GoDoxy:

  • Fixed agent routes latency calculation in health check, now uses GoDoxy -> Agent -> proxy target total latency
  • Fix http: superfluous response.WriteHeader error upon websocket failure
  • Fix 403 forbidden for agent metrics
  • Small network I/O optimization
